titles.title: No, not by might nor even power

authors.author: R Mark Â© 1998 Daybreak Music Ltd

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
No, not by might nor even power
But by Your Spirit, O Lord,
Healer of hearts, binder of wounds,
Lives that are lost restored,
Flow through this land till every man
Praises Your name once more.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let Your word go forth among the nations,
Let Your voice be heard among the people,
May they know our God, the only true God,
Reigns on earth as You reign in heaven,
May Your church be bold
And speak with one voice,
May our hearts be strong
And never failing,
May we know no fear,
Except a holy fear of You, our King.
